members.name: Meastoso
members.title: Webmaster
members.description: A FFXIV-focused broadcaster who also co-hosts a gaymer bear themed YouTube show, Meast is passionate about FFXIV, entrepreneurship, software development, foodies, traveling, and LGBTQIA+ equality. Come be a part of our “bear-backer” community on Twitch!

members.name: JUSTIN_NICK
members.title: FOUNDER
members.description: Justin is a proud LGBTQIA+ streamer, and is one of the founders of Rainbow Arcade. He is a variety streamer who loves story-driven games. He's also well-known within his community for questionable gameplay and an extremely loud laugh. No matter what, his community is a safe, welcoming space for all!

members.name: J0HNJ0HNN
members.title: FOUNDER
members.description: JohnJohn is a proud, body positive gay man. He’s a variety streamer and the Co-Founder of Rainbow Arcade. He loves story driven games with some action/horror sprinkled in. He likes to make people laugh with quick wit, bubbly personality, and the occasional drag or lewd comment.

members.name: ITSDACODA
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: Cody is a variety streamer who proudly identifies as and represents HIV+ LGBTQIA+ individuals. Playing anything from indie to AAA games, he strives to have a welcoming, safe and relaxed space. Head over to either take part in a wide variety of topics discussed or chill to some fun gameplay.

members.name: GLENNANGEL
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: Service with a smile made manifest. Glenn Ángel is an excitable Latinx variety streamer who enjoys Multiplayer Online Games. FFXIV is his main game but you will catch him playing other MMOs such as ESO or battle royales. He loves to practice other languages live so stop by with a "Ça va?" "Tudo Bem?" or "¡Hola!"

members.name: CYPHEROFTYR
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: Tanya is a variety streamer who is out and proudly Bi. Catch her playing RPG's, doing talk shows, GM prep or running around in FPS titles. She works to have a welcoming, safe and inclusive space. Stop in, bring a cuppa and hang out for a chill and welcoming time no matter what she's up to.

members.name: CAFEELA
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: Ela is a pansexual girl from Germany. She loves silly conversations and lewd jokes. Her streams feature "comfy games", such as Nintendo franchises, simulations, and indie games. Ela's community, The Café, is all about feeling welcome, valid, and cozy. You're always invited for a cuppa!

members.name: LITTLELEGSTV
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: A Dual-Heritage Gay man! He enjoys playing MMORPGs with a side of whatever his community, The Swine Club, is in the mood for. Constantly clipped out of context but all for the sake of a good laugh. There’s a safe place for you to relax over at LittleLegsTV

members.name: THATNERDVIOLET
members.description: ThatNerdViolet is a 31 year old bisexual horror streamer with an emphasis on Dead by Daylight. Outside of screams and memes, Violet has cultivated a caring community where charities focused on LGBTQIA+ and women’s rights have maintained a focus.

members.name: GAYMERGLENN
members.description: Glenn is best known for his reckless optimism, and his ability to be pinned by the nearest Reinhardt. He started streaming last year to make more people smile, and to build a community of like-minded people that just want to help each other feel good. GG!

members.name: FRANKTHEPEGASUS
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: FrankthePegasus is an excitable gamer who giggles her way through simulation and sandbox games. She makes games come alive by putting herself in silly situations to make others laugh. Frank's specialty is her ability to connect with her viewers and her passion for bringing good into the world via charity.

members.name: STEPHNEEE_PLZ
members.description: Steph is a pansexual streamer bringing you tech and games... with a please ! Through story games and first person shooters, her smile, laughter, and calm quickly break down any salt. Join her on youtube, twitch, ig, or twitter for some sass... and some stories!

members.name: KILCANNON
members.description: Kilcannon is also referred to as Kil or Daddycannon by many in the Twitch community. He’s a huge goofball that enjoys a broad variety of games ranging from MMOs, digital card games, FPS's, to RPGs. His streams are all about creating a safe space for affirmational, positive community development.

members.name: KYNETIQ
members.description: Kynetiq is a gay variety-caster based in Seattle. His Twitch channel focuses mainly on RPG titles. The mission of the channel is to foster a community where people can come together to discover the important lessons in the games we play. Come on by if you want a chill place to connect with others!

members.name: CHILIFARMER
members.description: Chili is a wholesome, yet quietly lewd gay man. He streams MMORPGs and JRPGs. He loves cute and colorful games that make him “UwU”. He loves to encourage all to be their authentic selves and spread the power of friendship around the world.

members.name: TheRainbowBard
members.description: TheRainbowBard is a bisexual/pansexual nonbinary variety streamer with a love of creating. Their stream includes video games, crafting, and ttrpgs. Their goal is to cultivate a positive, inclusive community that helps to remove the stigma around neurodiverse people.

members.name: KENSINGTON17
members.description: Kenny is a Dead By Daylight and Overwatch streamer with a hint of other variety of games. His goal is to provide a fun, inclusive community for his champions to be the best versions of themselves. Come for the games and stay for the party.

members.name: DAGONMAR
members.description: Dagonmar is a lewd streamer with a focus on story-heavy games. From lewd and outrgeous comedy, to cute puppy dogs, Dagonmar and his community has something for everyone. Also, his chat sometimes literally turns him into a wolf, but he's definitely (maybe) not a furry.

members.name: NICOLELONDONIO
members.description: Nicole/Nico LOVES FPS games, but plays and appreciates various types of games. Accessibility is what Nico strives for on Twitch, and other social platforms. A huge activist/advocate for marginalized communities that they're a part of.

members.name: URBANBOHEMIAN
members.description: Brian is a 47 year old Black queer variety streamer, writer, and foodie with a “PhD in Brunch”. He mostly plays narrative/action RPGs and the occasional looter shooter. He loves to have a good time on stream, make playful innuendos (ding!) and bring love & disco to every viewer.

members.name: PLEASANTLYTWSTD
members.description: PleasantlyTwstd is a black ace content creator focused on challenge runs, tryhard games, and RPGs. She makes content to promote a safe space for ALL marginalized peoples, with debauchery, tea, and wine, while raising money for charities such as Trevor Project, St. Jude, TWLOHA, and many more!

members.name: MERMAIDQUEENJUDE
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: Jude is a content creator, sailor guardian, and cat mom. She is a bisexual nonbinary femme (she/her & they/them) who plays mainly storybased and indie games. Her community, the Mermaid Kingdom, is based in empathy, compassion, and chaotic goodness.

members.name: EEVOLICIOUS
members.description: Eevo is a Portuguese variety Streamer who showcases his Drag transformations and Characters live on Twitch. Humour, drama and looks! Expect to see lots of Horror and multiplayer games. Promoting the power in being YOU, Eevolicious creates a space of acceptance and having fun with it!

members.name: BIRDOFCHESS
members.description: Birdofchess, aka Rook, is a variety MMO broadcaster and pansexual woman. Fostering a welcoming and uplifting community, she strives to spread smiles while helping players connect in-game and out. Rook is a Twitch and ArenaNet partner as well as co-host of Gamer Escape's Aetheryte Radio podcast.

members.name: CREVLM
members.description: Crev is a Final Fantasy XIV: Online, Indie games and light variety broadcaster. She's a retired USAF disabled veteran , mental health advocate and a bi-sexual woman.. She focuses building a space where people can feel comfortable & meet new friends. She can't wait to welcome you in as a new friend

members.name: AWNR
members.description: When games first started showcasing queer characters, Awnr began to see gaming in a new light. He came to Twitch hoping to spark that same sense of recognition. From adventures, to indies & digital art, he is constantly looking at things through a LGBTQIA+ lens.

members.name: KEN2PT0
members.description: Ken2pt0 focuses on Final Fantasy, Overwatch, & Pokémon. Viewers always get a healthy dose of KEN, stands for KINDNESS (uplifting fun!), EVOLUTION (new approaches, games,), & NANCY-BOI (lots of LGBTQIA+ content). Ken is like an Eevee, limitless potential. Hope you’ll tune in.

members.name: BADANDYWRITES
members.description: Andy is a variety streamer who loves playing story-rich games with relatable characters. When he’s not gaming, you can find him working on his fantasy novel in real-time. Follow along as he tackles revisions and shares details about the publishing industry, writing, and exploits his adorable dog.

members.name: SEALBURN
members.description: Scott is a 26 year old gaymer from Los Angeles, CA, working in media. He loves playing a range of story-driven, role playing, and FPS games. Through his streams, he strives on being a resource for LGBTQIA+ individuals and aims to build an inclusive community for everyone to hang out and have fun.

members.name: HAYDARU
members.description: Haydaru is a 26 year old Variety streamer from Australia. You can catch him playing any genre of game from JRPGs to Horror or Just Chatting to connect with his audience. He’s best known for his ear piercing scream and quirky sense of humour.

members.name: SYNXIEC
members.description: Synxiec (sin-zee-eck) is a lover of stories and player of tabletop games, RPGs, the occasional metroidvania, and spilling the tea about life in all its complexity. It is his hope that any visitors to his stream feel seen, loved, and more free to be themselves!

members.name: CURRYKALEL
members.description: Curry is a Variety Streamer who enjoys any game he can get his hands on. He is known to play a lot of Overwatch and DBD and he plays a bunch of social games with friends and has a welcoming community and makes sure everyone has a great time! He keeps things silly especially during drinking streams!

members.name: SPOFIE
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: Spofie is a primarily FFXIV streamer who also streams variety a couple days a week. She loves the Fire Emblem series and atmospheric games especially! Her streams are intended to always be a comfy and inclusive place to hang out.

members.name: PAIJEMONSTRE
members.description: Paije Monstre and her Kaiju Army are always striving to create a warm and welcoming community! The KA may sometimes be loud, silly, crude and lewd, but they are never afraid to talk about matters that matter! Bring yourself as you are, embrace creativity, and lift up others to do the same!

members.name: DUBUSAEYO
members.description: Dubu is a chill red-haired streamer who identifies as Asexual, Aromantic and Agender, and can usually be found running around trying to remember what they were doing half a second ago. They play a variety of games, ranging from VR to MMOs and visual novels, especially LGBTQIA+ themed ones.

members.name: PSYCHE
members.description: Psyche is an Irish variety streamer with a focus on space, sandboxes, and stories. Described by one viewer as “wholesomely lewd”, she aims to create an uplifting space where she yells about cats and hot aliens. She can also type the alphabet in 2.5 seconds, but has yet to find a use for this skill.

members.name: SIERRAXMYST
members.title: TEAM LEADER
members.description: Sierra Myst is a Queer Drag content creator from space, bringing you colourful personality and looks on Twitch! Catch Sierra in and out of drag playing a variety of games on with a focus on science-fiction, simulation, and trying to make a cozy community for everyone!

members.name: LOTUSLOVESLOTUS
members.description: Lotus is Texas’s foremost lesbian singleplayer stan. She’s all about creating a safe space for fellow gaymers to be themselves and goof around in, and isn’t afraid to be tough, but fair to get there. A proud indie rep, she’ll show you the best game you’ve never heard of - and it’ll be, like, $10.

members.name: DEENUGLIFE
members.description: DeeNugLife is a British LGBTQIA+ POC caster who is a massive fan of MMO's. Healthy discussions about topics that are traditionally dodged while maintaining a light hearted comedic undertone are welcomed. Banter, chaos and occasionally tears are expected!

members.name: JUSTICEKAZZY
members.description: JusticeKazzy (Kazuma) is a trans masc half-Japanese streamer. On his channel you'll find a variety of games being streamed and plenty of different topics being discussed; all ranging from media analysis to Japanese politics and LGBT+ movements around the globe.

members.name: XYNTO
members.description: Tony is a 31-year-old variety streamer. Mostly into JRPGs, you can find Tony playing a lot of Final Fantasy-based games, but he will occasionally drift into other kinds of games as well. He also loves food, board games, and running). Feel free to kick back, relax, and let the sillies out!

members.name: TOPH
members.description: Toph is a gay/demi streamer currently living in Tokyo, Japan. He focuses on creating comfy vibes 24/7 through games like Animal Crossing, Pokemon and various jRPGs. You can expect appearances from his dog Cookie, live Japanese translations, and a ton of community interaction.

members.name: BIGGUSBENNUS
members.description: BiggusBennus is a UK-based variety streamer with a penchant for story-driven games. His weekly streams tend to be very relaxed playthroughs of whatever single-player game has tickled his pickle and at the weekend he delves into multiplayer and co-op games with his community.

members.name: JIMBABY
members.description: Jimbaby is a 26 year old, proud, body positive gay man. He’s a variety streamer and a lover of all things Pokémon and Elder Scrolls. RPGs are his favorite, but he also has a soft spot for world-builders like Minecraft and Spore. He talks with his hands and his streaming goal is to make you smile.

members.name: NOLAY
members.description: Nolay is a 25 year-old, gay, male, multiracial, artist from Dallas, Texas. He makes his viewers laugh with his outrageous life experiences. He loves MMOs, story driven games, fighting games, & MOBAs. Head over there and vibe out!
